p: Different studies indicated that the fruits and leaves of other plants like Solanum nigrum L., Azadirachta indica A. Juss ., Ficus bengalensis, Ficus religiosa, Murraya koenigii, Ziziphus jujube, Citrullus lanatus, Grewia tenax, Murraya koenigii, and Maytenus emarginata are used for treating the thirst (Teklehaimanot et al., 2015 ▶, Kumar et al., 2008 ▶, Handral et al., 2012 ▶ and Rajbir Kaur, 2015).
